product_name: La Roche-PosayToleriane Purifying Foaming Cream Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganLa Roche-Posay Toleriane Purifying Foaming Cream Cleanser is a daily face wash for combination to oily skin types.
details: DetailsBenefitsGently cleanses while soothing & removing impurities & makeup from the skinAllergy testedKey IngredientsLa Roche Posay thermal spring water, helps to soothe the skinGlycerin, to help moisturize and prevent dryingFormulated WithoutParabensFragrancePreservativesItem 2620407How To UseStep 1: Use luke-warm water to wet face.Step 2: Apply in circular motions.Step 3: Rinse with water and tap skin dry to avoid irritating.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Myristic Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Stearic Acid, Lauric Acid, Palmitic Acid, Coco-Glucoside, Tetrasodium EDTA.
how_to_use: Step 1: Use luke-warm water to wet face.Step 2: Apply in circular motions.Step 3: Rinse with water and tap skin dry to avoid irritating.

reviews.headline: Drying
reviews.comments: I am combination skin, and I switched to this from the hydrating cleanser for two days, and it dried out my skin and gave me a few new whiteheads. I will be going back to the hydrating cleanser.

reviews.headline: La Roche-Posay Toleraine Purifying Foaming Cleanser
reviews.comments: This cleanser is soft, silky and very concentrated, which I love.  But most importantly, it makes my skin feel smooth, silky and hydrated.  A bonus is that it comes in a nice sized tube, great for traveling.

reviews.headline: Didn't LOVE it
reviews.comments: I have combo skin that isnt very sensitive but this face wash didnt do much for my skin, i think it dried out my skim barrier because now i have red patches. I heard it was great for others, just didnt work for me.

reviews.headline: Better option
reviews.comments: Its cheaper to buy refill bags on amazon!

I got this cleanser because I read reviews that said it helped redness. I have not seen any improvement yet for myself with redness, but I will say that it has not made it worse, which is a good sign. My skin doesn't feel tight after washing, but it feels clean. no residue-y feel afterwards which is better than the Estee Lauder wash I've been using. so, comparatively, it's a cheaper product with a better result than what I've been using. Hopefully, it will continue to work well. I would like to see it help with the redness, but I think I will need to use longer to see improvement in thar department. But, so far, I'm impressed.

reviews.headline: Holy Grail cleanser
reviews.comments: I am obsessed with this. Transitioning from the Clinique cream cleanser because I wanted more bang for my buck and I feel like this delivers. So, so gentle on my sensitive, oily/combo skin. Cleanses nicely without stripping your skin... I'm now able to use my salicylic acid toner for blackheads without it overly drying my skin. Pairs nicely with an exfoliating pad or on its own. Seriously, I will be repurchasing and need a jumbo size. After about a week my skin is so glowy. Love it!

reviews.headline: Hormonal acne is gone
reviews.comments: I've been dealing with really bad hormonal acne and not just the time around my period. I would get horrible and painful zits that would scar and be unsightly and nothing I used would get rid of them. That is until this cleanser came into my life, I saw a dermatologist on the clock app talking about how it's wonderful for hormonal acne and she was correct. My skin is smooth, soft, and if I do happen to get acne they don't come to a head and not painful whatsoever. I'm going to recommend this to everyone dealing with bad acne.

reviews.headline: Works Great, Buying again.
reviews.comments: Product work's great, turned my face a little red at first then my skin got used to it and now works as it should. The heat made half of the product evaporate sadly and running really low so I will be purchasing again.

reviews.headline: Clear skin
reviews.comments: Afters years of looking for a good cleanser I finally found the one that works for my skin. I have very sensitive dry skin. I have been struggling with acne for years and this products cleans my face so good and takes of every single makeup product even hard waterproof mascara. My face feels so clean after every wash and did not have any acne ever since I started using it. Just finished my first bottle and will keep on purchasing. I have tried many high end brands which did nothing for my skin also this cleanser was recommended by dermatologist.

reviews.headline: Yas
reviews.comments: Works so well and skin feels so clean

reviews.headline: For my oily girls
reviews.comments: I have very oily skin, it literally makes me crazy ! Ive tried numerous fondations, primers, etc to help with no luck. I coild apply make up and within a half hour i was always a grease pit ! This cleaners ans the moiturizer is perfect ! It has helped me tremendously! I will say it didnt take long until my face ended up too dry and i had to switch over to their normal to dry moisturizer. Today i purchased the normal to dry face wash so we will see how it goes, i expect the same wonderful results!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I have combination skin and have tried numerous face washes in hopes of maintaining a clear complexion.. I did try other face wash products in this brand that had medicated gel or what not and this is by far the best and keeps my pores clean! I would definitely recommend for any skin type as my skin is super sensitive

reviews.headline: Best Face Goes a Long Way
reviews.comments:
Many people might say the price of the product is out of their budget, but this product will last MONTH'S AND MONTHS compared to other brands that people spend 5 to 6 bucks on and have to get a new bottle every 3 weeks. When this bottle with last 3 to 4 times as long for cheaper, you just have to shell out more at the beginning. 

That being said I LOVE THIS! I got a trial size  (.1 oz) it lasted 7 days and used it twice a day and it cleared my chin within the first two uses. I was amazed. It doesn't dry out my skin that I can tell, but I also use philosophy ultimate day cream and night cream right afterwards to give my face moisture. If it does dry out I definitely recommend using a spf day cream especially during winter months anyways.

reviews.headline: recommended by my dermatologist
reviews.comments:
I use this foaming cleanser at the end of the day
to take off makeup because it does such a good
job and I only have to use a small amount.  I have been using this product for several years and
always come back to it.  I know it has all safe
ingredients in it and is great for my sensitive
skin.

reviews.headline: my go to facewash
reviews.comments: I am a budget buyer but I buy brands when it's important and I have super super sensitive skin and am allergic to nickel and this works perfect

reviews.headline: am & pm facewash
reviews.comments: I use it morning and nighttime. Followed with a toner and moisturizer and my skin is cared for.

reviews.headline: Best Face Wash!
reviews.comments:
I was introduced to this facewash from a friend. I have combination skin/ dry in the winter. It cleanses my sensitive skin, leaving it clean and unirritated. A little dab of this cleanser is enough to wash your entire face, since the substance is very concentrated. 

I will purchase again!

reviews.headline: Squeaky Clean
reviews.comments: Love, love, love!  After reviewing a ton of products I finally decided on this one to help with my Rosacea, but to be kind to my already sensitive skin.  This product is great!  I love that it leaves my skin feeling squeaky clean without over-drying.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Tried on a whim but can't go back!

reviews.headline: Great for dry skin!
reviews.comments: I love this face wash! I had really dry/sensitive skin and was looking for a gentle face wash to switch to; I had been using a scrub from the drug store that was too harsh. After one night of using this face wash, I saw an improvement in my skin's texture--my skin feels hydrated after using it. Treat your skin with this face wash!

faceoff_positive.comments: This cleanser does an excellent job at removing all dirt and makeup. When I dry my face on a towel, there is absolutely no makeup residue (which I've seen with some other cleansers). It leaves the skin feeling soft. The only thing I would change is the packaging and make it have a pump instead for easier use.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great Cleanser

faceoff_negative.comments: I possess normal to Oily, sensitive skin and I find this cleanser to be much too drying.  It does not contain any fragrance, which is wonderful for sensitive skin, and one only needs to use a pea sized amount for ample foam.  However, it simply is too drying.  The new Toleriane Purifying Gel Cleanser is by far superior to this formulation!
faceoff_negative.headline: Drying to the Skin!
